sqlMap.select:
select ZC_HT_CHG_ID,ZC_HT_CODE, ZC_DIYU_DAIMA, ZC_HT_NAME, ZC_HT_TYPE, ZC_REQ_CODE, ZC_MAKE_CODE, ZC_BID_CODE, CO_CODE, ND, ZC_SGN_DATE, ZC_SU_NAME, ZC_JCKDL_MC, ZC_HT_NUM, ZC_CZ_LEVEL, ZC_FUKUAN_TYPE, ZC_FUKUAN_YUED, ZC_CHECK_TYPE, ZC_CON_TEXT, ZC_CON_TEXT_BLOBID, ZC_HT_STATUS, AGENCY, ORG_CODE, ZC_SM_PJ1, ZC_SM_PJ2, ZC_SM_PJ3, ZC_SM_PJ4, EXECUTOR, EXECUTE_DATE, PROCESS_INST_ID, ZC_PARHT_CODE, ZC_SU_CODE, ZC_SU_ACC_CODE, ZC_SU_BANK_CODE, ZC_SU_BANK_NAME, ZC_SU_TEL, ZC_SU_LINKMAN, ZC_IS_ZXQY_ZB, ZC_GNW, ZC_SNW, ZC_ARRIVE_ADDR, ZC_ARRIVE_DATE, ZC_HANGYE_CTG, ZC_SK_REN, ZC_ZB_NAME, ZC_ZB_CODE, ZC_BI_NZJZ_SUM, ZC_ISREWRITE, ZC_CG_LEIXING, ZC_ZG_CS_NAME, ZC_BGSP_BH,ZC_DELIVERY_EVL,ZC_PRICE_EVL, ZC_QUANTITY_EVL,ZC_SERVICE_EVL,ZC_MEMO,ZC_BID_CONTENT , (select m.ZC_MAKE_NAME from ZC_P_PRO_MAKE m where m.zc_make_code = ZC_XMCG_HT.zc_make_code) as ZC_MAKE_NAME ,(select m.ZC_MONEY_BI_SUM from ZC_P_PRO_MAKE m where m.zc_make_code = ZC_XMCG_HT.zc_make_code) as ZC_MONEY_BI_SUM, ZC_DELIVERY_DATE,ZC_DELIVERY_ADDR,ZC_DELIVERY_TYPE , ZC_PRO_LIMIT_START_DATE, ZC_PRO_LIMIT_END_DATE, ZC_IMP_FILE, ZC_IMP_FILE_BLOBID from ZC_XMCG_HT_CHG ZC_XMCG_HT where 1=1
ZC_XMCG_HT.ND=#nd#
ZC_XMCG_HT.zc_parht_code is null
ZC_XMCG_HT.zc_parht_code is null
ZC_XMCG_HT.zc_parht_code is not null
exists (select instance_id from V_WF_CURRENT_TASK_ZC_TODO where executor =#executor# and instance_id = ZC_XMCG_HT.process_inst_id)
exists (select instance_id from V_WF_CURRENT_TASK_ZC_UNTREAD where executor =#executor# and instance_id = ZC_XMCG_HT.process_inst_id)
exists (select instance_id from V_WF_ACTION_HISTORY_GK53 where executor = #executor# and instance_id = ZC_XMCG_HT.process_inst_id) and ZC_XMCG_HT.ZC_HT_STATUS!='cancel' and ZC_XMCG_HT.ZC_HT_STATUS!='exec'
(ZC_XMCG_HT.ZC_HT_STATUS ='exec')
exists (select WF_DRAFT_NAME from as_wf_draft where user_id=#executor# and compo_id=#wfcompoId# and WF_DRAFT_ID=ZC_XMCG_HT.process_inst_id)
ZC_XMCG_HT.CO_CODE = #coCode#
ZC_XMCG_HT.ZC_HT_STATUS = #billStatus#
order by ZC_XMCG_HT.EXECUTE_DATE DESC

select ZC_HT_CHG_ID,ZC_HT_CODE, ZC_DIYU_DAIMA, ZC_HT_NAME, ZC_HT_TYPE, ZC_REQ_CODE, ZC_MAKE_CODE, ZC_BID_CODE, CO_CODE, ND, ZC_SGN_DATE, ZC_SU_NAME, ZC_JCKDL_MC, ZC_HT_NUM, ZC_CZ_LEVEL, ZC_FUKUAN_TYPE, ZC_FUKUAN_YUED, ZC_CHECK_TYPE, ZC_CON_TEXT, ZC_CON_TEXT_BLOBID, ZC_HT_STATUS, AGENCY, ORG_CODE, ZC_SM_PJ1, ZC_SM_PJ2, ZC_SM_PJ3, ZC_SM_PJ4, EXECUTOR, EXECUTE_DATE, PROCESS_INST_ID, ZC_PARHT_CODE, ZC_SU_CODE, ZC_SU_ACC_CODE, ZC_SU_BANK_CODE, ZC_SU_BANK_NAME, ZC_SU_TEL, ZC_SU_LINKMAN, ZC_IS_ZXQY_ZB, ZC_GNW, ZC_SNW, ZC_ARRIVE_ADDR, ZC_ARRIVE_DATE, ZC_HANGYE_CTG, ZC_SK_REN, ZC_ZB_NAME, ZC_ZB_CODE, ZC_BI_NZJZ_SUM, ZC_ISREWRITE, ZC_CG_LEIXING, ZC_ZG_CS_NAME, ZC_BGSP_BH,ZC_DELIVERY_EVL,ZC_PRICE_EVL, ZC_QUANTITY_EVL,ZC_SERVICE_EVL,ZC_MEMO,ZC_BID_CONTENT , (select m.ZC_MAKE_NAME from ZC_P_PRO_MAKE m where m.zc_make_code = master.zc_make_code) as ZC_MAKE_NAME ,(select m.ZC_MONEY_BI_SUM from ZC_P_PRO_MAKE m where m.zc_make_code = master.zc_make_code) as ZC_MONEY_BI_SUM, ZC_DELIVERY_DATE,ZC_DELIVERY_ADDR,ZC_DELIVERY_TYPE , ZC_PRO_LIMIT_START_DATE, ZC_PRO_LIMIT_END_DATE, ZC_IMP_FILE, ZC_IMP_FILE_BLOBID from ZC_XMCG_HT_CHG MASTER where MASTER.ZC_HT_CHG_ID = #zcHtChgId:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.insert: insert into ZC_XMCG_HT_CHG (ZC_HT_CHG_ID,ZC_HT_CODE, ZC_DIYU_DAIMA, ZC_HT_NAME, ZC_HT_TYPE, ZC_REQ_CODE, ZC_MAKE_CODE, ZC_BID_CODE, CO_CODE, ND, ZC_SGN_DATE, ZC_SU_NAME, ZC_JCKDL_MC, ZC_HANGYE_CTG, ZC_SK_REN, ZC_ZB_NAME, ZC_ZB_CODE, ZC_BI_NZJZ_SUM, ZC_ISREWRITE, ZC_CG_LEIXING, ZC_ZG_CS_NAME, ZC_IMP_FILE, ZC_IMP_FILE_BLOBID) values (#zcHtChgId:VARCHAR#, #zcHtCode:VARCHAR#, #zcDiyuDaima:VARCHAR#, #zcHtName:VARCHAR#, #zcHtType:VARCHAR#, #zcReqCode:VARCHAR#, #zcMakeCode:VARCHAR#, #zcBidCode:VARCHAR#, #coCode:VARCHAR#, #nd:CHAR#, #zcSgnDate:TIMESTAMP#, #zcSuName:VARCHAR#, #zcJckdlMc:VARCHAR#, #zcHtNum:DECIMAL#, #zcCzLevel:VARCHAR#, #zcFukuanType:VARCHAR#, #zcFukuanYued:VARCHAR#, #zcCheckType:VARCHAR#, #zcConText:VARCHAR#, #zcConTextBlobid:VARCHAR#, #zcHtStatus:VARCHAR#, #agency:VARCHAR#, #orgCode:VARCHAR#, #zcSmPj1:VARCHAR#, #zcSmPj2:VARCHAR#, #zcSkRen:VARCHAR#, #zcZbName:VARCHAR#, #zcZbCode:VARCHAR#, #zcBiNzjzSum:DECIMAL#, #zcIsrewrite:VARCHAR#, #zcCgLeixing:VARCHAR#, #zcZgCsName:VARCHAR#, #zcBgspBh:VARCHAR#,#zcDeliveryEvl:VARCHAR#,#zcPriceEvl:VARCHAR#, #zcProLimitEndDate:TIMESTAMP#, #zcImpFile:VARCHAR#, #zcImpFileBlobid:VARCHAR#)
sqlMap.update:
update ZC_XMCG_HT_CHG set ZC_HT_CHG_ID = #zcHtChgId:VARCHAR#, ZC_DIYU_DAIMA = #zcDiyuDaima:VARCHAR#, ZC_HT_NAME = #zcHtName:VARCHAR#, ZC_HT_TYPE = #zcHtType:VARCHAR#, ZC_REQ_CODE = #zcReqCode:VARCHAR#, ZC_MAKE_CODE = #zcMakeCode:VARCHAR#, ZC_BID_CODE = #zcBidCode:VARCHAR#, CO_CODE = #coCode:VARCHAR#, ND = #nd:CHAR#, ZC_SGN_DATE = #zcSgnDate:TIMESTAMP#, ZC_SU_NAME = #zcFukuanYued:VARCHAR#, ZC_CHECK_TYPE = #zcCheckType:VARCHAR#, ZC_CON_TEXT = #zcConText:VARCHAR#, ZC_CON_TEXT_BLOBID = #zcConTextBlobid:VARCHAR#, ZC_HT_STATUS = #zcHtStatus:VARCHAR#, AGENCY = #zcInputCode:VARCHAR#, EXECUTE_DATE = #zcInputDate:TIMESTAMP#, PROCESS_INST_ID = #processInstId:DECIMAL#, ZC_PARHT_CODE = #zcParhtCode:VARCHAR#, ZC_SU_CODE = #zcSuCode:VARCHAR#, ZC_SU_ACC_CODE = #zcSuAccCode:VARCHAR#, ZC_SU_BANK_CODE = #zcSuBankCode:VARCHAR#, ZC_SU_BANK_NAME = #zcSuBankName:VARCHAR#, ZC_SU_TEL = #zcSuTel:VARCHAR#, ZC_SU_LINKMAN = #zcSuLinkman:VARCHAR#, ZC_IS_ZXQY_ZB = #zcIsZxqyZb:VARCHAR#, ZC_GNW = #zcGnw:VARCHAR#, ZC_SNW = #zcSnw:VARCHAR#, ZC_ARRIVE_ADDR = #zcArriveAddr:VARCHAR#, ZC_ARRIVE_DATE = #zcArriveDate:TIMESTAMP#, ZC_HANGYE_CTG = #zcHangyeCtg:VARCHAR#, ZC_SK_REN = #zcSkRen:VARCHAR#, ZC_ZB_NAME = #zcZbName:VARCHAR#, ZC_ZB_CODE = #zcZbCode:VARCHAR#, ZC_BI_NZJZ_SUM = #zcBiNzjzSum:DECIMAL#, ZC_ISREWRITE = #zcIsrewrite:VARCHAR#, ZC_CG_LEIXING = #zcCgLeixing:VARCHAR#, ZC_ZG_CS_NAME = #zcZgCsName:VARCHAR#, ZC_BGSP_BH = #zcBgspBh:VARCHAR#, ZC_DELIVERY_EVL = #zcDeliveryEvl:VARCHAR#, ZC_PRICE_EVL = #zcPriceEvl:VARCHAR#, ZC_QUANTITY_EVL = #zcQuantityEvl:VARCHAR#, ZC_SERVICE_EVL = #zcServiceEvl:VARCHAR#, ZC_MEMO = #zcMemo:VARCHAR#, ZC_BID_CONTENT = #zcBidContent:VARCHAR#,
ZC_DELIVERY_DATE = #zcDeliveryDate:VARCHAR#, ZC_DELIVERY_ADDR = #zcDeliveryAddr:VARCHAR#, ZC_DELIVERY_TYPE = #zcDeliveryType:VARCHAR#,
zc_imp_file = #zcImpFile:VARCHAR#, zc_imp_file_blobid = #zcImpFileBlobid:VARCHAR#, zc_pro_limit_start_date = #zcProLimitStartDate:TIMESTAMP#, zc_pro_limit_end_date = #zcProLimitEndDate:TIMESTAMP# where ZC_HT_CODE = #zcHtCode:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.select: SELECT MASTER.ZC_HT_CHG_ID,MASTER.ZC_HT_CODE, MASTER.ZC_BI_NO, MASTER.ZC_BI_BCSY_SUM, MASTER.ZC_MAKE_CODE, ( SELECT sum(ZC_P_PRO_BAL_BI.ZC_BI_BCJS_SUM) FROM ZC_P_PRO_BAL_BI where ZC_P_PRO_BAL_BI.Zc_Ht_Bi_No = MASTER.ZC_PRO_BI_SEQ AND ZC_P_PRO_BAL_BI.Zc_Ht_Code = MASTER.ZC_HT_CODE ) as ZC_BI_YJJS_SUM, MASTER.ZC_BI_HTBA_SUM, MASTER.ZC_BI_YJCH_SUM, MASTER.ZC_BI_NZJZ_SUM, MASTER.ZC_PRO_BI_SEQ , (select nvl(zc_bi_jhua_sum,0) from zc_p_pro_mitem_bi where ZC_PRO_BI_SEQ=MASTER.ZC_PRO_BI_SEQ) - (select nvl(sum(ZC_BI_BCSY_SUM), 0) from zc_xmcg_ht_bi ht where ht.ZC_PRO_BI_SEQ = MASTER.ZC_PRO_BI_SEQ and ht.ZC_HT_CODE != MASTER.ZC_HT_CODE) zc_Can_Use_Sum,zc_bi_sum FROM ZC_XMCG_HT_BI_chg MASTER where ZC_HT_CHG_ID=#value:VARCHAR# order by zc_pro_bi_seq
sqlMap.delete: delete from ZC_XMCG_HT_BI_CHG BI where BI.ZC_HT_CHG_ID=#value:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.insert:
insert into ZC_XMCG_HT_BI_CHG (ZC_HT_CHG_ID,ZC_HT_CODE, ZC_BI_NO, ZC_BI_BCSY_SUM, ZC_MAKE_CODE, ZC_BI_YJJS_SUM, ZC_BI_HTBA_SUM, ZC_BI_YJCH_SUM, ZC_BI_NZJZ_SUM,ZC_PRO_BI_SEQ, ZC_BI_SUM,ZC_BI_DO_SUM,ZC_BI_YJBA_SUM,BI_TARGET_CODE,B_ACC_CODE, B_ACC_NAME,CO_CODE,CO_NAME,DEC_MONEY,FUND_CODE,FUND_NAME, INCEPTDOC_CODE,INCEPTDOC_NAME,MANAGE_CODE,MANAGE_NAME,ND, ORG_CODE,ORG_NAME,ORIGIN_CODE,ORIGIN_NAME,OUTLAY_CODE,OUTLAY_NAME, PAYOUT_CODE,PAYOUT_NAME,PAYTYPE_CODE,PAYTYPE_NAME,PROJECT_CODE, PROJECT_NAME,PROJECT_TYPE_CODE,PROJECT_TYPE_NAME,SENDDOC_CODE, SENDDOC_NAME,SENDDOC_TYPE_CODE,SENDDOC_TYPE_NAME,ZC_CG_TYPE, ZC_PLAN_TYPE,ZC_SAVE_NUM,ZC_CATALOGUE_CODE,ZC_CATALOGUE_NAME, ZC_YEAR,ZC_YEP_SUM,ZC_BI_APD_FLAG,ZC_FUND_REMARK,ZC_FUND_FILE, ZC_FUND_FILE_BLOBID,ZC_USE_BI_ID) values (#zcHtChgId:VARCHAR#,#zcHtCode:VARCHAR#, #zcBiNo:VARCHAR#, #zcBiBcsySum:DECIMAL#, #zcMakeCode:VARCHAR#, #zcBiYjjsSum:DECIMAL#, #zcBiHtbaSum:DECIMAL#, #zcBiYjchSum:DECIMAL#, #zcBiNzjzSum:DECIMAL#,
SEQ_ZC_PRO_BI.NEXTVAL
#zcProBiSeq#
,#zcBiSum:DECIMAL#,#zcBiDoSum:DECIMAL#,#zcBiYjbaSum:DECIMAL#, #biTargetCode:VARCHAR#,#bAccCode:VARCHAR#,#bAccName:VARCHAR#, #coCode:VARCHAR#,#coName:VARCHAR#,#decMoney:DECIMAL#, #fundCode:VARCHAR#,#fundName:VARCHAR#,#inceptdocCode:VARCHAR#, #inceptdocName:VARCHAR#,#manageCode:VARCHAR#,#manageName:VARCHAR#, #nd:VARCHAR#,#orgCode:VARCHAR#,#orgName:VARCHAR#, #originCode:VARCHAR#,#originName:VARCHAR#,#outlayCode:VARCHAR#, #outlayName:VARCHAR#,#payoutCode:VARCHAR#,#payoutName:VARCHAR#, #paytypeCode:VARCHAR#,#paytypeName:VARCHAR#,#projectCode:VARCHAR#, #projectName:VARCHAR#,#projectTypeCode:VARCHAR#, #projectTypeName:VARCHAR#,#senddocCode:VARCHAR#, #senddocName:VARCHAR#,#senddocTypeCode:VARCHAR#, #senddocTypeName:VARCHAR#,#zcCgType:VARCHAR#,#zcPlanType:VARCHAR#, #zcSaveNum:DECIMAL#,#zcCatalogueCode:VARCHAR#, #zcCatalogueName:VARCHAR#,#zcYear:VARCHAR#,#zcYepSum:DECIMAL#, #zcBiApdFlag:VARCHAR#,#zcFundRemark:VARCHAR#,#zcFundFile:VARCHAR#, #zcFundFileBlobid:VARCHAR#,#zcUseBiId:VARCHAR#)
sqlMap.select: SELECT ZC_HT_CHG_ID, ZC_HT_CODE, ZC_CTGRY_ID, ZC_YEAR, ZC_CATALOGUE_CODE, ZC_CATALOGUE_NAME, ZC_IS_JNJS, ZC_BRA_NAME, ZC_MER_SPEC, NVL(ZC_ITEM_VAL,0.00) ZC_ITEM_VAL, ZC_CAIG_SHL, ZC_SP_NAME, ZC_MER_IS_ZZCX, ZC_MER_IS_LSHB, NVL(ZC_MER_M_PRICE,0.00) ZC_MER_M_PRICE, NVL(ZC_HT_BI_MONEY,0.00) ZC_HT_BI_MONEY, NVL(ZC_HT_OTHER_MONEY,0.00) ZC_HT_OTHER_MONEY, NVL(ZC_HT_GK_MONEY,0.00) ZC_HT_GK_MONEY, NVL(ZC_ITEM_SUM,0.00) ZC_ITEM_SUM, NVL(BUDGET_BI_MONEY,0.00) BUDGET_BI_MONEY, NVL(BUDGET_OTHER_MONEY,0.00) BUDGET_OTHER_MONEY, NVL(ZC_CAIG_MONEY,0.00) ZC_CAIG_MONEY, NVL(ZC_CAIG_PRICE,0.00) ZC_CAIG_PRICE, ZC_CAIG_JLDW FROM ZC_T_BCHT_ITEM_CHG where ZC_HT_CHG_ID=#value:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.insert:
insert into ZC_T_BCHT_ITEM_CHG (ZC_HT_CHG_ID,ZC_CTGRY_ID, ZC_HT_CODE, ZC_YEAR, ZC_CATALOGUE_CODE,
ZC_CATALOGUE_NAME, ZC_IS_JNJS, ZC_BRA_NAME, ZC_MER_SPEC, ZC_ITEM_VAL, ZC_CAIG_SHL, ZC_SP_NAME,
ZC_MER_IS_ZZCX, ZC_MER_IS_LSHB, ZC_MER_M_PRICE, ZC_HT_BI_MONEY, ZC_HT_OTHER_MONEY,

#zcCatalogueName:VARCHAR#, #zcIsJnjs:VARCHAR#, #zcBraName:VARCHAR#, #zcMerSpec:VARCHAR#,

sqlMap.select: select ZC_HT_CHG_ID, BILL_CODE, PAY_ORDER, PAY_MONEY, REMARK,PERCENT,PAY_DATE,to_char(PAY_DATE,'YYYY') PAY_YEAR, to_char(PAY_DATE,'MM') PAY_MONTH from ZC_HT_PRE_PAY_BILL_ITEM_CHG where ZC_HT_CHG_ID=#value# order by PAY_ORDER
sqlMap.insert: insert into ZC_HT_PRE_PAY_BILL_ITEM_CHG (ZC_HT_CHG_ID,BILL_CODE, PAY_ORDER, PAY_MONEY, REMARK,PERCENT,PAY_DATE) values (#zcHtChgId:VARCHAR#,#billCode:VARCHAR#, #payOrder:VARCHAR#, #payMoney:DECIMAL#, #remark:VARCHAR#,#percent:VARCHAR#,#payDate:DATE#)
sqlMap.select: select ZC_HT_CHG_ID,ZC_HT_CODE, ZC_DIYU_DAIMA, ZC_HT_NAME, ZC_HT_TYPE, ZC_REQ_CODE, ZC_MAKE_CODE, ZC_BID_CODE, CO_CODE, ND, ZC_SGN_DATE, ZC_SU_NAME, ZC_JCKDL_MC, ZC_HT_NUM, ZC_CZ_LEVEL, ZC_FUKUAN_TYPE, ZC_FUKUAN_YUED, ZC_CHECK_TYPE, ZC_CON_TEXT, ZC_CON_TEXT_BLOBID, ZC_HT_STATUS, AGENCY, ORG_CODE, ZC_SM_PJ1, ZC_SM_PJ2, ZC_SM_PJ3, ZC_SM_PJ4, EXECUTOR, EXECUTE_DATE, PROCESS_INST_ID, ZC_PARHT_CODE, ZC_SU_CODE, ZC_SU_ACC_CODE, ZC_SU_BANK_CODE, ZC_SU_BANK_NAME, ZC_SU_TEL, ZC_SU_LINKMAN, ZC_IS_ZXQY_ZB, ZC_GNW, ZC_SNW, ZC_ARRIVE_ADDR, ZC_ARRIVE_DATE, ZC_HANGYE_CTG, ZC_SK_REN, ZC_ZB_NAME, ZC_ZB_CODE, ZC_BI_NZJZ_SUM, ZC_ISREWRITE, ZC_CG_LEIXING, ZC_ZG_CS_NAME, ZC_BGSP_BH,ZC_DELIVERY_EVL,ZC_PRICE_EVL, ZC_QUANTITY_EVL,ZC_SERVICE_EVL,ZC_MEMO,ZC_BID_CONTENT , (select m.ZC_MAKE_NAME from ZC_P_PRO_MAKE m where m.zc_make_code = master.zc_make_code) as ZC_MAKE_NAME ,(select m.ZC_MONEY_BI_SUM from ZC_P_PRO_MAKE m where m.zc_make_code = master.zc_make_code) as ZC_MONEY_BI_SUM, ZC_DELIVERY_DATE,ZC_DELIVERY_ADDR,ZC_DELIVERY_TYPE , ZC_PRO_LIMIT_START_DATE, ZC_PRO_LIMIT_END_DATE, ZC_IMP_FILE, ZC_IMP_FILE_BLOBID from ZC_XMCG_HT_HISTORY MASTER where MASTER.ZC_HT_CHG_ID = #zcHtChgId:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.insert: insert into ZC_XMCG_HT_HISTORY (ZC_HT_CHG_ID,ZC_HT_CODE, ZC_DIYU_DAIMA, ZC_HT_NAME, ZC_HT_TYPE, ZC_REQ_CODE, ZC_MAKE_CODE, ZC_BID_CODE, CO_CODE, ND, ZC_SGN_DATE, ZC_SU_NAME, ZC_JCKDL_MC, ZC_HT_NUM, ZC_CZ_LEVEL, ZC_FUKUAN_TYPE, ZC_FUKUAN_YUED, ZC_CHECK_TYPE, ZC_CON_TEXT, ZC_CON_TEXT_BLOBID, ZC_HT_STATUS, AGENCY, ORG_CODE, ZC_SM_PJ1, ZC_SM_PJ2, ZC_SM_PJ3, ZC_SM_PJ4, EXECUTOR, EXECUTE_DATE, PROCESS_INST_ID, ZC_PARHT_CODE, ZC_SU_CODE, ZC_SU_ACC_CODE, ZC_SU_BANK_CODE, ZC_SU_BANK_NAME, ZC_SU_TEL, ZC_SU_LINKMAN, ZC_IS_ZXQY_ZB, ZC_GNW, ZC_SNW, ZC_ARRIVE_ADDR, ZC_ARRIVE_DATE, ZC_HANGYE_CTG, ZC_SK_REN, ZC_ZB_NAME, ZC_ZB_CODE, ZC_BI_NZJZ_SUM, ZC_ISREWRITE, ZC_CG_LEIXING, ZC_ZG_CS_NAME, ZC_BGSP_BH,ZC_DELIVERY_EVL,ZC_PRICE_EVL,ZC_QUANTITY_EVL,ZC_SERVICE_EVL,ZC_MEMO,ZC_BID_CONTENT,ZC_DELIVERY_DATE,ZC_DELIVERY_ADDR,ZC_DELIVERY_TYPE , ZC_PRO_LIMIT_START_DATE, ZC_PRO_LIMIT_END_DATE, ZC_IMP_FILE, ZC_IMP_FILE_BLOBID) select #zcHtChgId:VARCHAR#, ZC_HT_CODE, ZC_DIYU_DAIMA, ZC_HT_NAME, ZC_HT_TYPE, ZC_REQ_CODE, ZC_MAKE_CODE, ZC_BID_CODE, CO_CODE, ND, ZC_SGN_DATE, ZC_SU_NAME, ZC_JCKDL_MC, ZC_HT_NUM, ZC_CZ_LEVEL, ZC_FUKUAN_TYPE, ZC_FUKUAN_YUED, ZC_CHECK_TYPE, ZC_CON_TEXT, ZC_CON_TEXT_BLOBID, ZC_HT_STATUS, AGENCY, ORG_CODE, ZC_SM_PJ1, ZC_SM_PJ2, ZC_SM_PJ3, ZC_SM_PJ4, EXECUTOR, EXECUTE_DATE, PROCESS_INST_ID, ZC_PARHT_CODE, ZC_SU_CODE, ZC_SU_ACC_CODE, ZC_SU_BANK_CODE, ZC_SU_BANK_NAME, ZC_SU_TEL, ZC_SU_LINKMAN, ZC_IS_ZXQY_ZB, ZC_GNW, ZC_SNW, ZC_ARRIVE_ADDR, ZC_ARRIVE_DATE, ZC_HANGYE_CTG, ZC_SK_REN, ZC_ZB_NAME, ZC_ZB_CODE, ZC_BI_NZJZ_SUM, ZC_ISREWRITE, ZC_CG_LEIXING, ZC_ZG_CS_NAME, ZC_BGSP_BH,ZC_DELIVERY_EVL,ZC_PRICE_EVL,ZC_QUANTITY_EVL,ZC_SERVICE_EVL,ZC_MEMO,ZC_BID_CONTENT,ZC_DELIVERY_DATE,ZC_DELIVERY_ADDR,ZC_DELIVERY_TYPE , ZC_PRO_LIMIT_START_DATE, ZC_PRO_LIMIT_END_DATE, ZC_IMP_FILE, ZC_IMP_FILE_BLOBID from ZC_XMCG_HT where zc_ht_code=#zcHtCode:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.select: SELECT MASTER.ZC_HT_CHG_ID,MASTER.ZC_HT_CODE, MASTER.ZC_BI_NO, MASTER.ZC_BI_BCSY_SUM, MASTER.ZC_MAKE_CODE, ( SELECT sum(ZC_P_PRO_BAL_BI.ZC_BI_BCJS_SUM) FROM ZC_P_PRO_BAL_BI where ZC_P_PRO_BAL_BI.Zc_Ht_Bi_No = MASTER.ZC_PRO_BI_SEQ AND ZC_P_PRO_BAL_BI.Zc_Ht_Code = MASTER.ZC_HT_CODE ) as ZC_BI_YJJS_SUM, MASTER.ZC_BI_HTBA_SUM, MASTER.ZC_BI_YJCH_SUM, MASTER.ZC_BI_NZJZ_SUM, MASTER.ZC_PRO_BI_SEQ , (select nvl(zc_bi_jhua_sum,0) from zc_p_pro_mitem_bi where ZC_PRO_BI_SEQ=MASTER.ZC_PRO_BI_SEQ) - (select nvl(sum(ZC_BI_BCSY_SUM), 0) from zc_xmcg_ht_bi ht where ht.ZC_PRO_BI_SEQ = MASTER.ZC_PRO_BI_SEQ and ht.ZC_HT_CODE != MASTER.ZC_HT_CODE) zc_Can_Use_Sum,zc_bi_sum FROM ZC_XMCG_HT_BI_HISTORY MASTER where ZC_HT_CHG_ID=#value:VARCHAR# order by zc_pro_bi_seq
sqlMap.delete: delete from ZC_XMCG_HT_BI_HISTORY BI where BI.ZC_HT_CHG_ID=#value:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.insert: insert into ZC_XMCG_HT_BI_History (ZC_HT_CHG_ID,ZC_HT_CODE, ZC_BI_NO, ZC_BI_BCSY_SUM, ZC_MAKE_CODE, ZC_BI_YJJS_SUM, ZC_BI_HTBA_SUM, ZC_BI_YJCH_SUM, ZC_BI_NZJZ_SUM,ZC_PRO_BI_SEQ, ZC_BI_SUM,ZC_BI_DO_SUM,ZC_BI_YJBA_SUM,BI_TARGET_CODE,B_ACC_CODE, B_ACC_NAME,CO_CODE,CO_NAME,DEC_MONEY,FUND_CODE,FUND_NAME, INCEPTDOC_CODE,INCEPTDOC_NAME,MANAGE_CODE,MANAGE_NAME,ND, ORG_CODE,ORG_NAME,ORIGIN_CODE,ORIGIN_NAME,OUTLAY_CODE,OUTLAY_NAME, PAYOUT_CODE,PAYOUT_NAME,PAYTYPE_CODE,PAYTYPE_NAME,PROJECT_CODE, PROJECT_NAME,PROJECT_TYPE_CODE,PROJECT_TYPE_NAME,SENDDOC_CODE, SENDDOC_NAME,SENDDOC_TYPE_CODE,SENDDOC_TYPE_NAME,ZC_CG_TYPE, ZC_PLAN_TYPE,ZC_SAVE_NUM,ZC_CATALOGUE_CODE,ZC_CATALOGUE_NAME, ZC_YEAR,ZC_YEP_SUM,ZC_BI_APD_FLAG,ZC_FUND_REMARK,ZC_FUND_FILE, ZC_FUND_FILE_BLOBID,ZC_USE_BI_ID) select #zcHtChgId:VARCHAR#,ZC_HT_CODE, ZC_BI_NO, ZC_BI_BCSY_SUM, ZC_MAKE_CODE, ZC_BI_YJJS_SUM, ZC_BI_HTBA_SUM, ZC_BI_YJCH_SUM, ZC_BI_NZJZ_SUM,ZC_PRO_BI_SEQ, ZC_BI_SUM,ZC_BI_DO_SUM,ZC_BI_YJBA_SUM,BI_TARGET_CODE,B_ACC_CODE, B_ACC_NAME,CO_CODE,CO_NAME,DEC_MONEY,FUND_CODE,FUND_NAME, INCEPTDOC_CODE,INCEPTDOC_NAME,MANAGE_CODE,MANAGE_NAME,ND, ORG_CODE,ORG_NAME,ORIGIN_CODE,ORIGIN_NAME,OUTLAY_CODE,OUTLAY_NAME, PAYOUT_CODE,PAYOUT_NAME,PAYTYPE_CODE,PAYTYPE_NAME,PROJECT_CODE, PROJECT_NAME,PROJECT_TYPE_CODE,PROJECT_TYPE_NAME,SENDDOC_CODE, SENDDOC_NAME,SENDDOC_TYPE_CODE,SENDDOC_TYPE_NAME,ZC_CG_TYPE, ZC_PLAN_TYPE,ZC_SAVE_NUM,ZC_CATALOGUE_CODE,ZC_CATALOGUE_NAME, ZC_YEAR,ZC_YEP_SUM,ZC_BI_APD_FLAG,ZC_FUND_REMARK,ZC_FUND_FILE, ZC_FUND_FILE_BLOBID,ZC_USE_BI_ID from ZC_XMCG_HT_BI where zc_ht_code=#zcHtCode:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.select: SELECT ZC_HT_CHG_ID, ZC_HT_CODE, ZC_CTGRY_ID, ZC_YEAR, ZC_CATALOGUE_CODE, ZC_CATALOGUE_NAME, ZC_IS_JNJS, ZC_BRA_NAME, ZC_MER_SPEC, NVL(ZC_ITEM_VAL,0.00) ZC_ITEM_VAL, ZC_CAIG_SHL, ZC_SP_NAME, ZC_MER_IS_ZZCX, ZC_MER_IS_LSHB, NVL(ZC_MER_M_PRICE,0.00) ZC_MER_M_PRICE, NVL(ZC_HT_BI_MONEY,0.00) ZC_HT_BI_MONEY, NVL(ZC_HT_OTHER_MONEY,0.00) ZC_HT_OTHER_MONEY, NVL(ZC_HT_GK_MONEY,0.00) ZC_HT_GK_MONEY, NVL(ZC_ITEM_SUM,0.00) ZC_ITEM_SUM, NVL(BUDGET_BI_MONEY,0.00) BUDGET_BI_MONEY, NVL(BUDGET_OTHER_MONEY,0.00) BUDGET_OTHER_MONEY, NVL(ZC_CAIG_MONEY,0.00) ZC_CAIG_MONEY, NVL(ZC_CAIG_PRICE,0.00) ZC_CAIG_PRICE, ZC_CAIG_JLDW FROM ZC_T_BCHT_ITEM_History where ZC_HT_CHG_ID=#value:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.insert: insert into ZC_T_BCHT_ITEM_HISTORY (ZC_HT_CHG_ID,ZC_CTGRY_ID, ZC_HT_CODE, ZC_YEAR, ZC_CATALOGUE_CODE, ZC_CATALOGUE_NAME, ZC_IS_JNJS, ZC_BRA_NAME, ZC_MER_SPEC, ZC_ITEM_VAL, ZC_CAIG_SHL, ZC_SP_NAME, ZC_MER_IS_ZZCX, ZC_MER_IS_LSHB, ZC_MER_M_PRICE, ZC_HT_BI_MONEY, ZC_HT_OTHER_MONEY, ZC_HT_GK_MONEY,ZC_ITEM_SUM,BUDGET_BI_MONEY,BUDGET_OTHER_MONEY,ZC_CAIG_JLDW,ZC_CAIG_PRICE,ZC_CAIG_MONEY) select #zcHtChgId:VARCHAR#,ZC_CTGRY_ID, ZC_HT_CODE, ZC_YEAR, ZC_CATALOGUE_CODE, ZC_CATALOGUE_NAME, ZC_IS_JNJS, ZC_BRA_NAME, ZC_MER_SPEC, ZC_ITEM_VAL, ZC_CAIG_SHL, ZC_SP_NAME, ZC_MER_IS_ZZCX, ZC_MER_IS_LSHB, ZC_MER_M_PRICE, ZC_HT_BI_MONEY, ZC_HT_OTHER_MONEY, ZC_HT_GK_MONEY,ZC_ITEM_SUM,BUDGET_BI_MONEY,BUDGET_OTHER_MONEY,ZC_CAIG_JLDW,ZC_CAIG_PRICE,ZC_CAIG_MONEY from ZC_T_BCHT_ITEM where zc_ht_code=#zcHtCode:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.select: select ZC_HT_CHG_ID, BILL_CODE, PAY_ORDER, PAY_MONEY, REMARK,PERCENT,PAY_DATE,to_char(PAY_DATE,'YYYY') PAY_YEAR, to_char(PAY_DATE,'MM') PAY_MONTH from ZC_HT_PAY_BILL_ITEM_HISTORY where ZC_HT_CHG_ID=#value# order by PAY_ORDER
sqlMap.insert: insert into ZC_HT_PAY_BILL_ITEM_HISTORY (ZC_HT_CHG_ID,BILL_CODE, PAY_ORDER, PAY_MONEY, REMARK,PERCENT,PAY_DATE) select #zcHtChgId:VARCHAR#,BILL_CODE, PAY_ORDER, PAY_MONEY, REMARK,PERCENT,PAY_DATE from ZC_HT_PRE_PAY_BILL_ITEM where bill_code=#zcHtCode:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.delete: delete from ZC_XMCG_HT_BI BI where BI.ZC_HT_CODE=#value:VARCHAR#

insert into ZC_XMCG_HT_BI (ZC_HT_CODE, ZC_BI_NO, ZC_BI_BCSY_SUM, ZC_MAKE_CODE, ZC_BI_YJJS_SUM, ZC_BI_HTBA_SUM, ZC_BI_YJCH_SUM, ZC_BI_NZJZ_SUM,ZC_PRO_BI_SEQ, ZC_BI_SUM,ZC_BI_DO_SUM,ZC_BI_YJBA_SUM,BI_TARGET_CODE,B_ACC_CODE, B_ACC_NAME,CO_CODE,CO_NAME,DEC_MONEY,FUND_CODE,FUND_NAME, INCEPTDOC_CODE,INCEPTDOC_NAME,MANAGE_CODE,MANAGE_NAME,ND, ORG_CODE,ORG_NAME,ORIGIN_CODE,ORIGIN_NAME,OUTLAY_CODE,OUTLAY_NAME, PAYOUT_CODE,PAYOUT_NAME,PAYTYPE_CODE,PAYTYPE_NAME,PROJECT_CODE, PROJECT_NAME,PROJECT_TYPE_CODE,PROJECT_TYPE_NAME,SENDDOC_CODE, SENDDOC_NAME,SENDDOC_TYPE_CODE,SENDDOC_TYPE_NAME,ZC_CG_TYPE, ZC_PLAN_TYPE,ZC_SAVE_NUM,ZC_CATALOGUE_CODE,ZC_CATALOGUE_NAME, ZC_YEAR,ZC_YEP_SUM,ZC_BI_APD_FLAG,ZC_FUND_REMARK,ZC_FUND_FILE, ZC_FUND_FILE_BLOBID,ZC_USE_BI_ID) select ZC_HT_CODE, ZC_BI_NO, ZC_BI_BCSY_SUM, ZC_MAKE_CODE, ZC_BI_YJJS_SUM, ZC_BI_HTBA_SUM, ZC_BI_YJCH_SUM, ZC_BI_NZJZ_SUM,ZC_PRO_BI_SEQ, ZC_BI_SUM,ZC_BI_DO_SUM,ZC_BI_YJBA_SUM,BI_TARGET_CODE,B_ACC_CODE, B_ACC_NAME,CO_CODE,CO_NAME,DEC_MONEY,FUND_CODE,FUND_NAME, INCEPTDOC_CODE,INCEPTDOC_NAME,MANAGE_CODE,MANAGE_NAME,ND, ORG_CODE,ORG_NAME,ORIGIN_CODE,ORIGIN_NAME,OUTLAY_CODE,OUTLAY_NAME, PAYOUT_CODE,PAYOUT_NAME,PAYTYPE_CODE,PAYTYPE_NAME,PROJECT_CODE, PROJECT_NAME,PROJECT_TYPE_CODE,PROJECT_TYPE_NAME,SENDDOC_CODE, SENDDOC_NAME,SENDDOC_TYPE_CODE,SENDDOC_TYPE_NAME,ZC_CG_TYPE, ZC_PLAN_TYPE,ZC_SAVE_NUM,ZC_CATALOGUE_CODE,ZC_CATALOGUE_NAME, ZC_YEAR,ZC_YEP_SUM,ZC_BI_APD_FLAG,ZC_FUND_REMARK,ZC_FUND_FILE, ZC_FUND_FILE_BLOBID,ZC_USE_BI_ID from Zc_Xmcg_Ht_Bi_Chg where ZC_HT_CHG_ID=#value:VARCHAR#

insert into ZC_T_BCHT_ITEM (ZC_CTGRY_ID, ZC_HT_CODE, ZC_YEAR, ZC_CATALOGUE_CODE, ZC_CATALOGUE_NAME, ZC_IS_JNJS, ZC_BRA_NAME, ZC_MER_SPEC, ZC_ITEM_VAL, ZC_CAIG_SHL, ZC_SP_NAME, ZC_MER_IS_ZZCX, ZC_MER_IS_LSHB, ZC_MER_M_PRICE, ZC_HT_BI_MONEY, ZC_HT_OTHER_MONEY, ZC_HT_GK_MONEY,ZC_ITEM_SUM,BUDGET_BI_MONEY,BUDGET_OTHER_MONEY,ZC_CAIG_JLDW,ZC_CAIG_PRICE,ZC_CAIG_MONEY) select ZC_CTGRY_ID, ZC_HT_CODE, ZC_YEAR, ZC_CATALOGUE_CODE, ZC_CATALOGUE_NAME, ZC_IS_JNJS, ZC_BRA_NAME, ZC_MER_SPEC, ZC_ITEM_VAL, ZC_CAIG_SHL, ZC_SP_NAME, ZC_MER_IS_ZZCX, ZC_MER_IS_LSHB, ZC_MER_M_PRICE, ZC_HT_BI_MONEY, ZC_HT_OTHER_MONEY, ZC_HT_GK_MONEY,ZC_ITEM_SUM,BUDGET_BI_MONEY,BUDGET_OTHER_MONEY,ZC_CAIG_JLDW,ZC_CAIG_PRICE,ZC_CAIG_MONEY from Zc_t_Bcht_Item_Chg where ZC_HT_CHG_ID=#value:VARCHAR#

insert into ZC_HT_PRE_PAY_BILL_ITEM (BILL_CODE, PAY_ORDER, PAY_MONEY, REMARK,PERCENT,PAY_DATE) select BILL_CODE, PAY_ORDER, PAY_MONEY, REMARK,PERCENT,PAY_DATE from ZC_HT_PRE_PAY_BILL_ITEM_CHG where ZC_HT_CHG_ID=#value:VARCHAR#
